title: Global smooth rigidity for toral automorphisms
authors: Boris Kalinin, Victoria Sadovskaya, Zhenqi Wang
abstract:
We study regularity of a conjugacy between a hyperbolic or partially
hyperbolic toral automorphism $L$ and a $C^\infty$ diffeomorphism $f$ of the
torus. For a very weakly irreducible hyperbolic automorphism $L$ we show that
any $C^1$ conjugacy is $C^\infty$. For a very weakly irreducible ergodic
partially hyperbolic automorphism $L$ we show that any $C^{1+\text{H\"older}}$
conjugacy is $C^\infty$. As a corollary, we improve regularity of the conjugacy
to $C^\infty$ in prior local and global rigidity results.
